author: Staff Reporter
text:
One person was killed and 27 others injured in a multiple collision involving two lorries and a bus near Shoolagiri in the early hours of Friday.

The lorry, believed to have triggered the multiple collision, was from Maalur in Karnataka. It was heading to Krishnagiri carrying poultry feed. While crossing Sundagiri, the driver lost control over the vehicle and crashed through the median of Bangalore-Krishnagiri Highway and hit a government transport corporation bus from Salem and a sand lorry from Tiruchi that were coming on the other side of the median.

The bus heading to Bangalore was carrying 33 passengers.

The front side of the sand lorry was completely damaged and the driver Manjunath was killed on the spot.Critical

The driver of the poultry lorry was said to be critical. The bus driver and 25 passengers suffered injuries.

The injured were admitted to Hosur Government Hospital.
title: One killed, 27 injured in multiple collision
